messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] She went to school today
messages.msgSnippet: Hi:  I have an eight year old at home today and who did not start school.  That classroom sounds nice, though.  Nate has no desire to return after a year and
messages.messageBody:
Hi: I have an eight year old at home today and who did not start
school. That classroom sounds nice, though. Nate has no desire to
return after a year and half. Lisa of Great Falls.

-----Original Message-----
From: maryfhickman@... [mailto:maryfhickman@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 28, 2002 10:52 AM
To: AlwaysLearning
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] She went to school today

Hi All,

My unschooled 8 year old went to school today. I'm trying to let it be,
see
what she wants to see. Her teacher is friendly, she has a piano in the
class,
and plants. Though I have one pursuing a formal acedemic path, I have 2
babes
home, and I will always believe being home is best. How strange it was
to get
up and find shoes and make a pb and j sando. Ashley was very helpful,
getting
the 2 year old dressed and the 5 year old's shoes on. This is a grand
thing in
our house. Helpful attitudes.

Mary H.

messages.subject: She went to school today
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, My unschooled 8 year old went to school today. I m trying to let it be, see what she wants to see. Her teacher is friendly, she has a piano in the
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

My unschooled 8 year old went to school today. I'm trying to let it be, see
what she wants to see. Her teacher is friendly, she has a piano in the class,
and plants. Though I have one pursuing a formal acedemic path, I have 2 babes
home, and I will always believe being home is best. How strange it was to get
up and find shoes and make a pb and j sando. Ashley was very helpful, getting
the 2 year old dressed and the 5 year old's shoes on. This is a grand thing in
our house. Helpful attitudes.

Mary H.
